origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CarSharingAPI.get_market_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves market operational data for car sharing services based on the specified region and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region of interest, e.g., North America, Europe.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the data, e.g., 2023, Q1 2023.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketData', 'description': 'The operational data for the car sharing market in the specified region and time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CarSharingAPI.get_market_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'North America', 'timeFrame'是'2023'.
